artifact.name: getAvatarForProject
artifact.description: Get Avatar information of the given project.

artifact.name: getAvatarsForProject
artifact.description: returns all avatars which are visible for the currently logged in user. The avatars are grouped into system and custom.

artifact.name: getComponentsOfProject
artifact.description: Contains a full representation of a the specified project's components.

artifact.name: getStatusesOfProject
artifact.description: Get all issue types with valid status values for a project.

artifact.name: getVersionsOfProject
artifact.description: Contains a full representation of a the specified project's versions.

artifact.name: getRolesOfProject
artifact.description: Contains a list of roles in this project with links to full details.

artifact.name: getRolesByIdOfProject
artifact.description: Details on a given project role.

artifact.name: getUserAssignableProjects
artifact.description: Returns a list of users that match the search string and can be assigned issues for all the given projects. This resource cannot be accessed anonymously.
